events.name: Battery production network evolution
events.wd_description: Understanding the evolution of the LiB production network requires a backward integration in a production network, and the role of the state as an 'inter-scalar mediator' in this process.
events.description: Understanding the evolution of the LiB production network requires a backward integration in a production network, and the role of the state as an 'inter-scalar mediator' in this process.

events.name: Consideration of battery manufacturing with automotive and power sectors
events.wd_label: Consideration of battery manufacturing with automotive and power sectors
events.wd_description: The increasing intersection of battery manufacturing with the automotive and power sectors highlights efforts by the Bolivian state to integrate its resources into this network via a strategy of majority state control in alliance with external (German, Chinese) partners.
events.description: The increasing intersection of battery manufacturing with the automotive and power sectors highlights efforts by the Bolivian state to integrate its resources into this network via a strategy of majority state control in alliance with external (German, Chinese) partners.

events.name: Highlighting the organisation of battery production from mineral extraction through to end-uses in mobile and stationary energy storage and differing firm strategies along this chain
events.wd_label: Highlighting the organisation of battery production from mineral extraction through to end-uses in mobile and stationary energy storage and differing firm strategies along this chain
events.wd_description: Existing applications to battery minerals adopt GPN as a loose heuristic – a way of invoking the organisation and control of downstream production and its influence on extraction.
events.description: Existing applications to battery minerals adopt GPN as a loose heuristic – a way of invoking the organisation and control of downstream production and its influence on extraction.

events.name: Identification of the multiple roles of the state in shaping the geographies of battery production
events.wd_label: Identification of the multiple roles of the state in shaping the geographies of battery production
events.wd_description: The evolution of the LiB production network requires understanding the role of the state as an 'inter-scalar mediator' and its impact on the organisation of battery production from mineral extraction through to end-uses.
events.description: The evolution of the LiB production network requires understanding the role of the state as an 'inter-scalar mediator' and its impact on the organisation of battery production from mineral extraction through to end-uses.

events.name: Analysis of the backward integration in a production network

events.wd_description: Understanding the evolution of the LiB production network requires considering the role of the state as an 'inter-scalar mediator' and its impact on the organisation of battery production from mineral extraction through to end-uses.

events.name: State role
events.wd_description: The state plays multiple roles in the GPN, including facilitating market growth, regulating investment and trade, and acting as a buyer.
events.description: The state plays multiple roles in the GPN, including facilitating market growth, regulating investment and trade, and acting as a buyer.

events.name: Gigafactory Deployment
events.description: Growth of battery gigafactories driven by automotive demand, highlighting regional concentration and strategic national developments.
